itunes:title: there is no one way to #fitness | train for your goals, train for life
title: there is no one way to #fitness | train for your goals, train for life
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
This week, Britt's back for a solo episode to chat all about how our training can change, just as our goals do! Tune in to chat about body building, resistance training, powerlifting, yoga, pilates & more! There is no "one way" to workout, choose exercise and movement into your life in a way that you love and that fits your lifestyle.

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Timestamps

01:05 weekly update

5:50 Disney recap

9:00 life is a rollercoaster

12:30 health as a whole

13:10 training styles change with our goals 

15:50 the problem with blanket statements around training 

19:19 body building

25:05 power lifting 

27:40 pilates

30:15 Britt’s definition of fitness

36:30 review of the week
